tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Barjinder is superb, since I was not able to move properly so was hesitant to go to the Clinic and took the consultation over a Video Call through Practo however since we were not able to determine the exact issue and since I was a bit sceptical if there was Bone broken or a Severe Muscle Sprain, Dr. Barjinder asked me to come to the clinic to clear all my doubts, At the Clinic he did all his diagnoses and I got an X-Ray done but by God‚Äôs Grace it was only a Muscle issue and not a Bone issue, Then he calmly explained all the steps of what to do and what not to do. Dr. Barjinder is the most Calm and Composed Doctor I have met, I have a phobia for Doctors wherein they won‚Äôt listen and would tell you to do something which you might not be comfortable in but with Dr. Barjinder it was totally opposite. ‚ÄúThe Best Doctor ‚Äú also the Staff was very friendly at the clinic and got all my medicines and Rib Brace at the same place. Highly Recommended!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is v good and treatment to v good and doctor is near my location and my house  .he is v good doctor orthopaedic

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
*** **** ***** ******* * **** **** *** **** ** ******I am a teacher and I distinctly remember my students had their exams of 12th board. Accidentally my ankle got fractured and I was rushed to nearby hospital. To my disappointment I was advised immediate surgery.Thankfully someone recommended saying that second opinion must be taken .I went to Dr Barjinder and he said that no surgery was required only treatment like my leg needs a plaster for few weeks.An assurance was given that I would walk again on my feet as I did earlier whereas the Dr who advised surgery didn't guarantee. Left with little choice I went with Amrit clinic and within 8 weeks I was running like I did earlier. 
What else could one ask for .He saved me from surgery and ofcourse from shelling surgery money.
God bless him
reply_text:
It was nice to hear about your complete recovery fro fracture of ankle, without surgery.
May god keep you in good health.
